main event: A round, white object was observed drifting slowly in Cedar Key, Florida on December 5, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as having characteristics of a weather balloon., The observation lasted for about 1 minute., The object was observed using binoculars., It was reported that the object was hovering at an altitude of 1500-2000 feet for around 30 seconds before accelerating., The report was part of Project Blue Book archive.
